31 
69 template<typename LogType>
70 LogType plLogSum(const LogType* logs, const unsigned int len)
71 {
72  const LogType minus_inf = std::log(LogType(0.0));
73  const LogType one = 1.0;
74  const LogType log_of_2 = std::log(LogType(2.0));
75 
76 
77  if(len == 0) return minus_inf;
78  if(len == 1) return logs[0];
79 
80  LogType result;
81 
82 
83  if(minus_inf == logs[0] && minus_inf == logs[1]){
84  result = minus_inf;
85  }
86  else if(minus_inf == logs[0]){
87  result = logs[1];
88  }
89  else if(minus_inf == logs[1]){
90  result = logs[0];
91  }
92  else if(logs[1] < logs[0]){
93  result = logs[0] + std::log(one + std::exp(logs[1] - logs[0]));
94  }
95  else if(logs[1] > logs[0]){
96  result = logs[1] + std::log(one + std::exp(logs[0] - logs[1]));
97  }
98  else { // logs[1] == logs[0]
99  result = logs[1] + log_of_2;
100  }
101 
102  LogType term;
103  for(unsigned int i = 2; i < len; ++i){
104  term = logs[i];
105 
106  if(minus_inf == result && minus_inf == term){
107  result = minus_inf;
108  }
109  else if(minus_inf == result){
110  result = term;
111  }
112  else if(minus_inf == term){
113  //result = result; nothing to do
114  }
115  else if(term < result){
116  result += std::log(one + std::exp(term - result));
117  }
118  else if(term > result){
119  result = term + std::log(one + std::exp(result - term));
120  }
121  else{ // term == result
122  result += log_of_2;
123  }
124  }
125 
126  return result;
127 }
128 
129 //=============================================================================
135 template<typename LogType>
136 inline LogType plLogSum(const std::vector <LogType> &logs)
137 {
138  return plLogSum( &logs[0], logs.size() );
139 }

605  plFloat compute_symmetric_dissimilarity(const plHMM &other,
606  const std::vector< ObservationSequence_t> &this_obs_sequences,
607  const std::vector< ObservationSequence_t> &other_obs_sequences)const
608  {
609  return PL_HALF*(this->compute_dissimilarity_to(other, this_obs_sequences) +
610  other.compute_dissimilarity_to(*this, other_obs_sequences));
611  }
